mapper.select: SELECT gt.goods_type_id, gt.goods_type_name,gt.goods_type_pid FROM dgg_store.goods_typeinfo gt

SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.goods_name,gd.goods_price,gd.goods_sales,imgsp.image_path, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM dgg_store.goodsinfo gd WHERE img.goods_img_type = 1 AND gd.goods_type_id = #{typeId}) count FROM dgg_store.goodsinfo gd INNER JOIN dgg_store.goods_image img ON img.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN dgg_store.image_space imgsp ON imgsp.image_id = img.image_id WHERE img.goods_img_type = 1 AND gd.goods_type_id = #{typeId} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT gd.goods_id,gd.goods_name, gd.goods_price,gd.goods_sales,gd.goods_attr, gd.goods_count,tof.template_default_price goods_freight,img.image_path goods_images, gs.standard_name,gs.standard_id,gs.standard_price,gs.standard_count FROM dgg_store.goodsinfo gd INNER JOIN dgg_store.template_of_freight tof ON gd.template_freight_id = tof.template_freight_id INNER JOIN dgg_store.goods_image gi ON gi.goods_id = gd.goods_id INNER JOIN dgg_store.image_space img ON img.image_id = gi.image_id LEFT JOIN dgg_store.goods_standard gs ON gs.goods_id = gd.goods_id WHERE gd.goods_id = #{goodsId}
